articles.title: Koreans in Russia plan events to mark birthday of Pres. Kim Il Sung
Indian personage on originality of ideological and  theoretical activities of Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia plan events to mark birthday of Pres. Kim Il Sung
   Moscow, March 14 (KCNA) -- A Preparatory Committee of the 
United Confederation of Koreans in Russia for Events to Mark 
the 85th Birthday of President Kim Il Sung 
was formed with due ceremony in Moscow on March 13.
   Ri Tong Chol, Chairman of the Confederation, was elected 
Chairman of the preparatory committee at the meeting.
   On the occasion of the 85th birthday of the great leader 
the committee will hold commemorative meetings, symposiums 
on famous works of the president, film shows, art 
performances, propaganda about his greatness through 
publications and meetings for adopting a letter and other 
colorful events among the Korean organisations and Koreans 
in Russia.

articles.title: Repressive forces reinforced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Indian personage on originality of ideological and  theoretical activities of Secy. Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- S. Mukherjee, Chairman of 
the Central Control Committee of the Central Committee of 
the Communist Party of India (Marxist), met with a KCNA 
correspondent in new delhi on March 5 on the occasion of the 
15th anniversary of the publication of "On the Juche Idea", 
a famous work of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   He said that every event in Korea and the international 
arena demonstrates the validity and vitality of the ideas 
and theories Secretary Kim Jong Il indicated in the work.
   "He gave a new and overall exposition of the attributes 
of man, the position and role of man in nature and society 
and the fundamental question of philosophy", he noted, and 
went on:
   "The work is a universal and encyclopedic one showing the 
timeliness and originality of his ideological and 
theoretical activities.
   "Though socialism was frustrated in some countries, Korea 
has firmly defended the socialist banner by meeting the 
demands of the original Juche idea in all sectors of 
revolution and construction.
   "The Juche idea becomes the highest peak in the 
development of human thought as it fully mirrors the demand 
of the present time for independence.
   "It grips the hearts of millions of people for its truth, 
logicality and attraction."

articles.title: Kim Young Sam and his son destined to be punished
articles.content:
Repressive forces reinforced in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam 
traitorous clique of South Korea, on March 13, decided to 
set up  a "security investigation corps" at the puppet 
police agency, "security investigation teams" at nine 
police bureaux and "security sections" at some 30 police 
stations for the purpose of "eliminating those harming 
national security", South Korea's Hankuk Ilbo newspaper said 
on Friday.
   They also reportedly decided to increase the number of 
those guarding the main western coastal areas and arm them 
with new-shape rifles, bulletproof vests, etc. In response 
to "possible provocation by the north".
   Meanwhile, the puppet clique scheme to set up  joint 
investigation teams against "election offenders" at the 
police stations throughout South Korea with the 
"Presidential elections" scheduled for late this year.
   Worse still, they plan to reinforce police officers 
abroad and equip them with data-checking facilities and 
checking machines. 
   The moves are part of the Kim Young Sam group's efforts 
to extensively reinforce the anti-communist repressive tools 
and forces, thus emerging from the serious crisis caused by 
the retrogressive revision of "laws" and the Hanbo incident.

articles.title: Japan urged to stop seeking overseas expansion
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam and his son destined to be punished
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Recently, South Korean 
opposition parties criticized Kim Young Sam's second son, 
kim Hyon Chol, for taking all the "state affairs" into his 
hands over the past four years by abusing the power of his 
father.
   The South Korean Chosun Ilbo daily said Kim Hyon Chol has 
placed his men in "Chongwadae" and dabbled in the 
"President's personal affairs". He was also accused of 
putting his nose into the nomination of candidate 
"assemblymen".
   In a commentary Rodong Sinmun today says the fact shows 
that Kim Young sam's "politics" is only a mixture of power, 
money and plots and the south Korean political circles are 
nothing but a puppet manipulated by arbitrariness, dictatorship 
and high-handedness by Kim Young Sam and his son.
   Rodong Sinmun further says:
   Kim Young Sam had better admit at once the crimes he has 
committed hand in glove with his son, step down and 
voluntarily go to prison.
   Nevertheless, Kim Young Sam is trying hard to gloss over 
their crimes and get out of the crisis caused by the Hanbo 
incident.
   The criminals are destined to be punished and the truth 
can never be concealed.
   It is already late for him to cover up their crimes and 
public anger is so strong that they cannot escape from 
punishment.
   It is the South Korean people's will to throw them into 
gaol like Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Tae Woo.
   Kim Young Sam finds no other outlet but being punished 
for his crimes of the blackest dye.

articles.title: War frenzy is no way out
articles.content:
Japan urged to stop seeking overseas expansion
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Japan said it will decide 
after this year's summer on whether or not take part in the 
establishment of the Theatre Missile Defense (TMD) system by 
the United States. The fact shows that the Japanese 
reactionaries' intention to step up military modernization 
under the pretext of "threat from the DPRK" remains 
unchanged.  Rodong Sinmun says this in a commentary today.
   Japan's plan to take part in the establishment of the TMD 
system under the preposterous pretext indicates that the TMD 
system's target is the DPRK and the military modernization 
sought by the Japanese reactionaries is designed to reinvade 
Korea militarily and, furthermore, dominate the whole of 
Asia, the daily says, adding:
   Such moves of Japan will inevitably enkindle arms race 
in the Asian region.
   If Japan, with the fiction of the DPRK's "threat", 
persistently seeks military aggression and overseas 
expansion in concert with the United States, instead of 
atoning for what it did against Korea in the past, we will 
never remain an onlooker to what it is doing.
   Those who groundlessly slander others and desperately try 
to attain their goal of aggression cannot go unpunished.

articles.title: War games to emerge from crisis
articles.content:
War frenzy is no way out 
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) --  Kim Young Sam reportedly 
trumpeted a war ballad in a "commissioning ceremony" at the 
puppet air force academy on March 14.
   He called for "remaining watchful over possible 
adventurous military provocation of North Korea" and vowed 
to "render all assistance" to war preparations.
   This shows that he regards new war with the north as a 
way out of the worst crisis caused by the Hanbo scandal.
   This year Kim Young Sam finds himself in a hopeless 
quagmire with the "disputed labor law" and the Hanbo loan 
scandal. Some time ago, his son Kim Hyon Chol turned out to 
be the chief culprit of the Hanbo scandal, concentrating 
public hatred on "Chongwadae."
   "Chongwadae" is the target of public criticism. Political 
and public circles strongly demand that Kim Hyon Chol be 
brought to justice without delay.
   It is self-evident that this will lead to the ouster of 
kim Young Sam himself, the mastermind of the scandal.
   Branded as "dead body," Kim Young Sam is making a last-
ditch effort such as "reshuffle of the ruling party and the 
cabinet" and reckless war exercises.
   Provocations are perpetrated near the military 
demarcation line amid war exercises taking place across 
South Korea almost every day.
   Kim Young Sam is working hard to create a war atmosphere 
with outcries over "security crisis caused by North Korea."
   This reminds one of a tigermoth that flies to light and 
falls dead.

articles.title: What reexamination of "defence cooperation guidelines" is after
articles.content:
War games to emerge from crisis 
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson today comments 
on the ceaseless war exercises of the Kim Young Sam regime 
against the north.
   The first combat flying corps of the South Korean puppet 
air force staged an exercise of combat preparedness on march 
10-13. An exercise to "examine the preparedness against 
enemy infiltration" took place in five districts in Seoul, 
including the railway station on the evening of March 14.
   The news analyst brands this as an intolerable challenge 
and provocation against the people's desire for national 
reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification.
   The analyst says:
   The anti-DPRK campaign of the puppets is motivated by a 
criminal intention to divert public hatred elsewhere, bridge 
over the political and economic confusion and save the 
crisis of the "civilian government."
   The Kim Young Sam regime is seeking a way out of the 
serious crisis in the intensified anti-DPRK campaign. This 
is a foolish attempt, however.
   Those who are fond of fire will be burned to death in 
flames. 
   The Kim Young Sam regime must stop the reckless war 
exercises at once, mindful that the more exercises, the 
sooner they will go to their doom.

articles.title: Guinean President meets DPRK Government delegation
articles.content:
What reexamination of "defence cooperation guidelines" is after 
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday runs 
an article on the dangerous nature of the reexamination of 
the U.S.-Japan "defence cooperation guidelines."
   The author of the article says:
   With the end of the cold war, the Soviet Union collapsed 
and the ghost of "threat from communism" disappeared. As 
there is no ground for the United States and Japan to 
maintain their "defence cooperation guidelines," a leftover 
of the cold war, they scheme to revise the "guidelines" 
under a new pretext and use them for sinister purposes.
   The United States intends to tighten military control 
over Japan, use Japan's aggressive forces for U.S. Military 
supremacy and establish domination over Asia without much 
difficulty.
   The Japanese reactionaries plan to hasten the building of 
a military power and realise their ambition for overseas 
expansion through active participation in U.S. moves of 
aggression and war.
   The reexamination of the "guidelines" brings dark clouds 
of aggression and war to Asia. Korea is the first target.
   The Asian people must heighten vigilance over the 
reexamination of the "guidelines."

articles.title: Banquet for WFP officials
articles.content:
Guinean President meets DPRK Government delegation 
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- lansana Conte, President of 
Guinea, met a Government delegation of the Democratic 
People's Republic of Korea led by Vice-Premier and Foreign 
Minister Kim Yong Nam on March 13.
   The Guinean people regard it as the greatest happiness 
and pride to greet a delegation from the DPRK, the President 
said, and went on:
   "President Kim Il Sung rendered full support and 
cooperation to Guinea in the past. So we always remember 
him. 
   "Today his excellency the great Kim Jong Il, the 
successor to the cause of the president, pays special 
attention to guinea.
   "in the name of the government and people of guinea and 
in my own, i extend sincere greetings to his excellency 
Kim Jong Il for valuing friendship with guinea as the great 
President Kim Il Sung did."
